selected_quotes: 'Racism, Crisis, Brexit' - a new article co-written with Satnam Virdee, published this morning. #openaccess
Good to have this article linking racism, austerity political crisis in understanding Brexit
I'm really looking forward to reading this.
'In state of emergency...There r resources of hope, but time is running out' Brilliant
